channel.title: Comments on: Building a SharePoint 2013 BI Demo Environment Part 4 â€“ Installing SQL Server
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Sajid
item.dc:creator: Sajid
item.description:
Dear Koen,
I did follow every steps. I created a BI Site from enterprise template and add Data Connection from site content. While creating data source from Multidimensional -> Analysis service I am not getting the database. I did install SQL_AS_ADOMD driver. Tried every possible ways but my analysis server database is not showing while creating data source. Can you tell me what's wrong?
item.content:encoded:
Dear Koen,

I did follow every steps. I created a BI Site from enterprise template and add Data Connection from site content. While creating data source from Multidimensional -> Analysis service I am not getting the database. I did install SQL_AS_ADOMD driver. Tried every possible ways but my analysis server database is not showing while creating data source. Can you tell me what’s wrong?

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: Hi Bud, thanks for your time to read the series and for your kind words.
item.content:encoded: Hi Bud, thanks for your time to read the series and for your kind words.

item.title: By: Bud Treanor
item.dc:creator: Bud Treanor
item.description: Koen, a GREAT piece of work THANK YOU. I'm looking forward to the remaining pieces. It will make a great piece to show off capabilities.
item.content:encoded: Koen, a GREAT piece of work THANK YOU. I’m looking forward to the remaining pieces. It will make a great piece to show off capabilities.
